snippet: A spokesman for the Tripoli government’s chief of staff said the helicopter was hit by antiaircraft fire and crashed into the sea.
abstract: Helicopter carrying military commanders is shot down in Libya, killing at least 12 people.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for the Tripoli government’s chief of staff said the helicopter was hit by antiaircraft fire and crashed into the sea.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Libya: Officers Are Killed in Downing of Helicopter
headline.main: Libya: Officers Are Killed in Downing of Helicopter
